```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

```

```{r}
# Load the data
f <- file.choose("new_retail_data.csv")
retail <- read.csv(f)

# View basic structure
str(retail)
summary(retail)
```

```{r}
cols_to_remove <- c("Email", "Phone", "Address", "Name")
retail <- retail %>% select(-all_of(cols_to_remove))

```

```{r}
cols_to_remove <- c('Transaction_ID', 'Time')
retail <- retail %>% select(-all_of(cols_to_remove))
```

```{r}
str(retail)
```

```{r}
retail <- retail[retail$Country=='USA',] 
```

```{r}
retail <- retail[retail$Product_Category=='Clothing',]
```
